attributes.action: Change the time you are allowed to have your dogs on the beach all year.
attributes.background: Change the time you are allowed dogs on the beach during high season; I.e. 15 May - 30 September. before 10am - and after 6pm.

rejection.details:
The decision about when to allow dogs on beaches is the responsibility of the relevant local authority.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
